description: An attractive contemporary-style restaurant right in the town centre, with a striking colour scheme and minimalist decor. The cuisine is inspired by traditional Piedmontese recipes which are reinterpreted with an imaginative touch by young, talented chef Valentina Maioni who selects top-quality ingredients and cooks with real passion.
